rows.Title: App stops when sending a message
rows.Problem: App crashes when trying to send a message by tapping the name in the messaging app. Issue persists after clearing data and cache. Device is a standard S25 model with chat feature enabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: The messaging app crashes when attempting to send a message by tapping the contact name.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during a core function (sending a message), preventing users from communicating, which renders the messaging capability unusable.

rows.Title: Exception occurs when entering battery background app usage restriction in Device Care
rows.Problem: App crashes or alerts appear when entering battery background app usage restriction in Device Care
rows.Summarized Problem: The app crashes or shows alerts when users try to access the battery background app usage restriction in Device Care.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes or displays alerts during a critical device setting function, preventing users from managing battery usage effectively.

rows.Title: Quick Panel settings are reset every time the device boots
rows.Problem: Quick Panel settings are reset every time the device boots, causing inconvenience
rows.Summarized Problem: The Quick Panel settings are reset each time the device boots, requiring frequent reconfiguration.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconvenience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Reboot occurs while playing music with Alsong (theme changes to default afterward)
rows.Problem: REBOOT REASON: RescueParty by com.android.systemui
rows.Summarized Problem: Device restarts while playing music, with the theme reverting to default afterward.
rows.Severity Reason: The device crashes and restarts during normal usage, disrupting user experience and causing unexpected theme changes.

rows.Title: Reboot occurs when the device is idle
rows.Problem: REBOOT REASON: RescueParty by com.android.systemui
rows.Summarized Problem: The device restarts unexpectedly when idle due to RescueParty triggering in the system UI.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts unexpectedly when idle, making it unusable and disrupting normal operation.

rows.Title: The Always On Display (AOD) background appears unnatural, and the clock stutters when the screen is turned on/off
rows.Problem: The AOD background appears unnatural and the clock stutters when the screen is turned on or off
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display background appears unnatural and the clock stutters when the screen is turned on or off.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the AOD functionality, causing visual and timing inconsistencies during screen transitions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Exception occurs when launching the Langrisser game
rows.Problem: Langrisser game cannot be launched
rows.Summarized Problem: The Langrisser game cannot be launched and crashes upon startup.
rows.Severity Reason: The game fails to launch, preventing user from accessing the application entirely, which is a major functional failure.

rows.Title: Screen turns black when clicking "New Updates" in Setup Wizard
rows.Problem: Pressing "New Updates" in Setup Wizard results in a black screen, which persists even after retrying or going back and forward.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience a black screen when clicking 'New Updates' in the Setup Wizard, and the issue persists after retrying navigation.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen turns black immediately upon interaction, making the feature unusable and preventing user progress in setup.

rows.Title: Circle to Search displays a font with poor readability
rows.Problem: Circle to Search displays a poorly readable English font after One UI 8.5 beta update
rows.Summarized Problem: Circle to Search displays a poorly readable English font after One UI 8.5 beta update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in font rendering during a specific feature interaction, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: Chrome's English font is unsatisfactory after One UI 8.5 beta update
rows.Problem: Chrome's English font appears incorrect after One UI 8.5 beta update, showing inconsistent or multiple fonts instead of a single consistent font, which is distracting and undesirable.
rows.Summarized Problem: Chrome displays inconsistent English fonts after One UI 8.5 beta update, deviating from expected uniformity.
rows.Severity Reason: The font inconsistency affects user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Font Size and Style in Baedal Minjok app
rows.Problem: In the Baedal Minjok app, English, special characters, and numbers are displayed in a font other than One UI Sans.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Baedal Minjok app displays English, special characters, and numbers in a font other than One UI Sans.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a display inconsistency in a specific app, affecting text rendering but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: Font corruption in sleep statistics at the bottom of the sleep alarm setting
rows.Problem: Clock app - sleep alarm setting has corrupted font for 'sleep statistics' with missing underline and distorted text
rows.Summarized Problem: The font for 'sleep statistics' in the sleep alarm setting is distorted and corrupted with missing underline.
rows.Severity Reason: The font corruption affects readability of a key feature in the sleep alarm setting, making it difficult for users to understand the content.

rows.Title: Volume up button is unresponsive
rows.Problem: Volume up button does not respond when pressed, even when held for a long time, while volume down button works normally
rows.Summarized Problem: The volume up button on the device is unresponsive and does not increase volume when pressed, even with prolonged pressure.
rows.Severity Reason: The volume up button fails to function properly, affecting user interaction with audio settings, but volume down still works, indicating a partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Reduced sound quality of camera shooting effects
rows.Problem: The sound quality of camera and screenshot effects has decreased, and it feels like the effects are now lower in quality. It would be helpful to revert to the previous One UI 8.0 effects or improve the current sound quality of the effects.
rows.Summarized Problem: The sound quality of camera shooting effects has degraded and appears lower than before.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a noticeable drop in audio quality during camera effects but does not prevent core camera functionality or cause device failure.

rows.Title: No color or transparency options in app folder settings
rows.Problem: Folder color and transparency options do not appear when folder settings are set
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set color or transparency for app folders in the Samsung Members app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in folder settings, preventing customization, but the device remains usable and core functions operate normally.

rows.Title: Font Size and Style Font thickness selection does not apply to the battery icon numbers
rows.Problem: When selecting font thickness, the battery icon numbers do not apply the change.
rows.Summarized Problem: The font thickness setting does not apply to the battery icon numbers on the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual appearance of the battery icon but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Font Size and Style
rows.Problem: After changing the font and increasing the text size, returning to default font causes the notification bar and quick panel to display time and date in Roboto font.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification bar and quick panel display time and date in Roboto font after returning to default font settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper visual consistency and affects core UI elements, making the device appear inconsistent and potentially confusing to users.

rows.Title: NFC icon remains continuously pressed
rows.Problem: The NFC icon appears as if it is still being pressed, even when not touched after navigating to settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The NFC icon stays in a pressed state after navigation, appearing active when not interacted with.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visual misrepresentation of NFC status but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Animation refresh rate drops below 60Hz when additional buttons are pressed during a call
rows.Problem: Animation refresh rate drops below 60Hz when additional buttons are pressed during a call
rows.Summarized Problem: Animation refresh rate drops below 6-0Hz when additional buttons are pressed during a call.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable drop in animation smoothness during calls but does not prevent call functionality or cause device freezing or data loss.

rows.Title: Folder photos are deselected when entering the gallery app after setting a wallpaper
rows.Problem: Folder photos are deselected when entering the gallery app after setting a wallpaper
rows.Summarized Problem: Folder photos are automatically deselected when re-entering the gallery app after setting a wallpaper.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in gallery navigation but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Note in the bottom menu of the message conversation window is untranslated
rows.Problem: The 'Notes' item in the message conversation window is not translated and should be displayed as 'Note' to match the Samsung Notes app.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Notes' feature in the message conversation window is not translated and should be displayed as 'Note' to align with the Samsung Notes app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a missing translation in a UI element, affecting consistency with another app, but does not impact device usability or core functionality.

rows.Title: The button does not respond when taking a long screenshot after taking a regular screenshot
rows.Problem: The button does not respond when taking a long screenshot after taking a regular screenshot
rows.Summarized Problem: The button does not respond when taking a long screenshot after a regular screenshot is taken.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in the screenshot function, where the button fails to respond after a regular screenshot, but does not prevent device usability or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Ghosting occurs when adjusting multi-window size
rows.Problem: Ghosting occurs when adjusting multi-window size
rows.Summarized Problem: Ghosting appears when adjusting the size of multi-window on the display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a visual artifact during a functional interaction but does not cause device failure or complete malfunction.

rows.Title: Misalignment of icons and text when displaying sleep routine on the lock screen's notification bar
rows.Problem: The sleep icon and text are not vertically aligned on the Now bar in the lock screen. The sleep icon is positioned to the left of the text, and there is a slight misalignment between the sleep icon and text and the 'Do Not Disturb' text.
rows.Summarized Problem: The sleep icon and text are vertically misaligned on the lock screen's Now bar, with the icon positioned incorrectly relative to the text.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial visual misalignment that affects user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Adaptive clock settings on the lock screen are reset
rows.Problem: The adaptive clock settings on the lock screen are reset and do not stay applied or initialized
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive clock settings on the lock screen are reset and do not remain applied.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not retain user settings after reboot or refresh, causing intermittent functionality but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Overall battery usage time is short
rows.Problem: Overall battery usage time is short. Battery usage time is only 12 hours despite not using battery excessively.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery lasts only 12 hours under normal usage, significantly shorter than expected.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery life is drastically reduced, making the device unusable for daily use and affecting core functionality.

rows.Title: Lagging after switching media output
rows.Problem: Lagging occurs when switching media output and returning to original state
rows.Summarized Problem: The device lags significantly when switching media output and returning to the original state.
rows.Severity Reason: The device experiences noticeable lag during media output switching, which disrupts user experience and may affect usability.

rows.Title: The Restore/Delete button icon for individual photos in the trash is located at the top
rows.Problem: The restore/delete button icon for individual photos in the trash is located too high compared to the 'all restore/all delete' button for selected photos
rows.Summarized Problem: The restore/delete button icon for individual photos in the gallery trash is positioned too high compared to the all-restore/all-delete button for selected photos.
rows.Severity Reason: This is a minor UI positioning issue that does not affect device functionality or usability.

rows.Title: Photos organized into group folders move to the first album page
rows.Problem: Group folders in the Gallery app frequently move to the first album page, and when attempting to move items by selecting and navigating, the move fails. Items can only be reorganized by adding new items to the folder, after which the original structure returns. The files appear correctly in 'My Files' but are incorrectly displayed in the app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Group folders in the Gallery app incorrectly move to the first album page, and item reorganization via selection fails.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper folder management and leads to inconsistent file organization, making the app functionally unusable for users who rely on structured folder navigation.

rows.Title: The top Wi-Fi signal icon moves left and right based on signal strength
rows.Problem: The Wi-Fi signal icon on the top bar moves left and right depending on signal strength, with different spacing when signal strength is 4 or 3 bars.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Wi-Fi signal icon on the top bar shifts left and right as signal strength changes, causing inconsistent positioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent UI behavior but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Reboot occurs during ALSong playback
rows.Problem: Log is insufficient or hardware inspection is necessary. Please resolve with analysis result and required information within two weeks.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device restarts during ALSong playback, and logs are insufficient for analysis.
rows.Severity Reason: Device rebooting during audio playback renders the device unusable during media use.

rows.Title: Reboot occurs while using the Korea Radio 2 app
rows.Problem: Reboot occurs while using the Korea Radio 2 app
rows.Summarized Problem: The device restarts unexpectedly while using the Korea Radio 2 app.
rows.Severity Reason: The device repeatedly reboots during app usage, indicating a critical instability that disrupts core functionality and user experience.

rows.Title: Overall battery usage time is short
rows.Problem: Overall battery usage time is short. Using no apps, battery drains rapidly compared to ONE UI 8.0
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery drains rapidly even when no apps are running, significantly faster than previous versions of ONE UI.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly under normal usage conditions, which makes the device unusable for extended periods without charging.

rows.Title: The quick access icon on the lock screen is too large
rows.Problem: The lock screen app icon is too large
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick access app icon on the lock screen is too large.
rows.Severity Reason: The icon size is excessive but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes, indicating a partial UI malfunction.

rows.Title: The zoom animation is choppy when touching the Now Bar on the lock screen
rows.Problem: The zoom animation is choppy when expanding and collapsing the Now Bar on the lock screen, causing frame drops and a jerky animation.
rows.Summarized Problem: The zoom animation of the Now Bar on the lock screen is choppy and jerky, with visible frame drops during expansion and collapse.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the animation functionality, causing a noticeable but not disruptive user experience during interaction.

rows.Title: The Do Not Disturb icon text on the lock screen's Now Bar is large and left-aligned
rows.Problem: The Do Not Disturb icon text on the Now Bar is larger and left-aligned compared to other items like sleep mode, and needs modification.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Do Not Disturb icon text on the lock screen's Now Bar is oversized and left-aligned, differing from other elements.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a visual inconsistency in UI layout but does not prevent device functionality or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: There is a choppy animation when touching the clock on the lock screen
rows.Problem: The animation when transitioning from the lock screen clock to the full clock view is choppy and the background darkens unnaturally.
rows.Summarized Problem: The animation when tapping the clock on the lock screen is choppy and the background darkens unnaturally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the animation during screen transition, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.

rows.Title: There is a frame drop when going back from viewing a photo in the album.
rows.Problem: Frame drop occurs when going back from viewing a photo in the album, causing the back animation to stutter.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience stuttering during the backward navigation animation when viewing photos in an album.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent performance degradation during normal app navigation but does not prevent device usage or lead to data loss.

rows.Title: The live effect in the detailed information of photos in the Gallery app disappears
rows.Problem: The live effect in the photo details view of the Gallery app is no longer visible after updating to version 8.5
rows.Summarized Problem: The live effect feature in photo details view within the Gallery app has disappeared after updating to version 8.5.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key view but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Touch recognition error for some menus within the Gallery
rows.Problem: Touch recognition error in gallery menu and settings scroll section where visible empty spaces do not respond to touch input, causing incorrect recognition of actions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience touch recognition errors in gallery menus and settings scroll areas, where visible empty spaces do not respond to touch input.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in touch response, affecting usability in specific menu interactions but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: When the icon size is set to medium or larger, icons in home screen folders are fixed to the minimum size
rows.Problem: When icon size is set to medium or larger, icons in home screen folders remain at minimum size while icons in app drawers and main home screen bottom are properly sized.
rows.Summarized Problem: Icons in home screen folders remain at minimum size when icon size is set to medium or larger, while icons in app drawers are correctly sized.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of icon sizing on folders, affecting only one part of the home screen, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: The top bar icons are displayed with narrow spacing
rows.Problem: The top bar icons are too closely spaced and look awkward, especially after updating to One UI 8.5 beta, requiring improvement in icon spacing.
rows.Summarized Problem: Icons on the status bar are too closely spaced and appear awkward after updating to One UI 8.5 beta.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance and usability of the status bar but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.

rows.Title: The Now Bar media player reappears after being deleted
rows.Problem: The media player in the top Now Bar area reappears after being deleted by swiping left or right.
rows.Summarized Problem: The media player in the Now Bar reappears after being deleted by swiping.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the media player returns after deletion, but the device remains usable and does not crash or freeze.

rows.Title: The Now Bar media player reappears after being deleted
rows.Problem: Log is attached and generated within one minute after the issue occurs. The log is insufficient or hardware inspection is necessary, and further analysis is required within two weeks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar media player reappears after being deleted on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the media player reappears after deletion, but the device remains otherwise functional and does not cause complete failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Text is not displayed on the bottom icons when entering Samsung Find
rows.Problem: Icon text is not displayed
rows.Summarized Problem: Icon text does not display when entering Samsung Find.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the interface, where text is missing on icons but the overall functionality of the app remains usable.

rows.Title: The top bar notification panel does not slide down
rows.Problem: The top bar notification panel does not slide down on vertical screens, excluding the home screen. It shows no response when scrolling, or only works once every 10 attempts.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel on the top bar fails to slide down when scrolling on vertical screens, excluding the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification panel is completely unresponsive in most cases, preventing users from accessing alerts, making the device functionally unusable.

rows.Title: The "Clear Voice" menu for Buds3 Pro disappears
rows.Problem: Buds3 Pro voice clarity feature disappears
rows.Summarized Problem: The Clear Voice feature on Buds3 Pro is no longer visible or accessible.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature disappearance prevents users from accessing a key audio enhancement function, making the device less usable.

rows.Title: A pop-up error occurs when retrying to connect earbuds
rows.Problem: Error occurs when retrying to connect earbuds after attempting software update in the Buds 3 Pro settings, despite both earbuds being properly connected and functioning normally.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users encounter a persistent pop-up error when retrying to connect earbuds after attempting a software update in the Buds 3 Pro settings, even when the earbuds are already properly connected and functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in the earbud connection process during software update attempts, but the device remains functional and audio playback continues normally.

rows.Title: The Android Digital Car Key NFC is disabled but reactivates
rows.Problem: NFC malfunction occurs after Android Digital Car Key is disabled; it reactivates after reboot or several hours. When the digital car key is active, using Samsung Pay with a transit card results in 'Please place one card' error. The user must repeatedly disable the feature, causing inconvenience, especially during bus rides where it leads to missing stops.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Android Digital Car Key NFC reactivates automatically after being disabled, causing errors when using transit cards and requiring frequent manual intervention.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes functional errors during transit card usage and requires repeated user intervention, disrupting normal device operation and user experience.

rows.Title: Screen does not switch using swipe gestures
rows.Problem: Swiping gestures do not work reliably for screen switching after beta update; it occasionally fails and requires multiple attempts to succeed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Swiping gestures fail to switch screens reliably after a beta update, requiring multiple attempts to work.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent failure of a core navigation function, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Brightness Settings The quick panel changes to pink when dark mode is set
rows.Problem: The quick panel changes to pink when dark mode is set
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel turns pink when dark mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a visual element in the settings interface but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Step counting in Samsung Health does not work
rows.Problem: Step counting in Samsung Health does not work
rows.Summarized Problem: Step counting in Samsung Health is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The step counting feature, a core health function, is not working, preventing users from tracking physical activity.

rows.Title: Lock Screen The lock screen clock color is applied with a slight delay
rows.Problem: The lock screen clock color is applied with a slight delay when manually set to the brightest white color 255, 255, 25
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen clock color applies with a noticeable delay after being manually set to white.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a delay in color application but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Lock Screen The screen flickers and stops when entering a PIN on the lock screen
rows.Problem: The screen flickers and stops when entering a PIN on the lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen flickers and stops responding when a user attempts to enter a PIN.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock screen fails to respond during PIN entry, preventing user access and potentially leading to device unavailability.

rows.Title: Playlist cannot be loaded from the Now Bar on the lock screen
rows.Problem: Cannot load playback playlist from the Now Bar on the lock screen, making it inconvenient to use. Suggest adding playlist functionality to the lock screen Now Bar so users can control music without unlocking the device.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the lock screen fails to load music playlists, preventing users from accessing music controls without unlocking the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full functionality of music control on the lock screen but does not cause device failure or data loss, and a feature enhancement suggestion is provided.

rows.Title: The adaptive clock displays hours and minutes differently
rows.Problem: The adaptive clock has an error
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive clock on the lock screen displays hours and minutes incorrectly.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock shows incorrect time, which affects usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: The top bar notification panel does not slide down
rows.Problem: The top bar does not slide down
rows.Summarized Problem: The top bar notification panel fails to slide down properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification panel is a core part of the display interface, and its failure prevents users from accessing notifications, making the device functionally unusable.

rows.Title: Interruption in the animation of Do Not Disturb notifications
rows.Problem: When turning on the screen from locked state and opening the quick settings, the 'Do Not Disturb mode is on' message appears abruptly without animation, making the transition feel unnatural.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Do Not Disturb mode is on' message appears without animation when accessing quick settings from the locked screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a visual inconsistency in user interface flow but does not prevent device functionality or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: The camera shutter sound is the same as the Motion Photo shutter sound
rows.Problem: The sound when taking a photo is the same as the motion photo shutter sound, and the sound is poor compared to before
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera shutter sound is identical to the motion photo shutter sound and is significantly less pleasant than before.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a functional inconsistency in audio feedback during photo capture, affecting user experience but not preventing device operation or causing critical failures.

rows.Title: After closing Now Brief, it reappears again
rows.Problem: Now brief appears after closing, it should not appear
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature reappears after being closed, when it should not appear.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature behaves incorrectly after closure but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes, indicating a partial malfunction.

rows.Title: The Quick Panel does not come down while an app is running
rows.Problem: The status bar does not come down when an app is running, regardless of the app used, such as Samsung Members, KakaoTalk, or Samsung Browser.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Quick Panel fails to descend when an app is running, affecting usability during app usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The status bar does not respond when an app is active, preventing user access to notifications and essential UI elements, making the device unusable in practical scenarios.

rows.Title: After the update, felt noticeable heating three times within one hour.
rows.Problem: Feeling noticeable heating during YouTube viewing and file upload, occurring three times within one hour, leading to phone shutdown and restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during YouTube viewing and file uploads, causing shutdown and restart within one hour.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating leads to device shutdown and restart, disrupting core functionality and posing safety risks.

rows.Title: Chat+ does not work
rows.Problem: Chat+ recording error after beta update 8.5. Chat+ is not working on S25U. Same model S25 works fine after beta update. Unable to resolve despite repeated attempts. Started yesterday.
rows.Summarized Problem: Chat+ recording functionality fails after beta update 8.5 on S25U model.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional after update, preventing users from using Chat+ which is a core messaging function.

rows.Title: In the Messages app, the text color of the notification bar matches the background
rows.Problem: In Samsung Messages app, the notification bar text color is always white and matches the background, making it invisible on bright screens. Changing the chat background to black does not change the notification bar text color.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification bar text color in the Messages app remains white and matches the background, making it invisible on bright screens regardless of background color changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification bar text is completely invisible on bright screens, rendering a key UI element unusable and preventing users from seeing essential information.

rows.Title: When checking internal storage in Device Care, duplicate files are deleted together.
rows.Problem: After ONE UI 8.5 beta update, internal storage in Device Care shows duplicated files, with some videos and MP3 files appearing twice. Deleting one instance removes all duplicates, leading to loss of data and inability to recover.
rows.Summarized Problem: Duplicate files appear in internal storage after a UI update, and deleting one instance removes all duplicates, resulting in data loss.
rows.Severity Reason: Users lose critical data due to deletion of all duplicates, and recovery is not possible, making the issue high-severity and impactful.

rows.Title: Slow response when dialing during a call
rows.Problem: Slow response when dialing during a call, such as when clicking a button to call or when receiving a call, the screen actions are slow.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dialing during an active call is slow and unresponsive, causing delay when initiating or receiving calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in call functionality, affecting user interaction during calls but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Lag when exiting photos in the Gallery
rows.Problem: Animation in Gallery changed, experiencing lag when exiting photos. Videos cannot be uploaded due to photos. Request for improvement.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience lag when exiting photos in the Gallery, leading to videos being unable to upload.
rows.Severity Reason: Lag during photo exit disrupts user flow and prevents video uploads, affecting core functionality.

rows.Title: Lag when switching from the home screen to the apps screen
rows.Problem: Lag occurs when switching between home screen and apps screen, initially noticeable and later becomes smoother but still feels sluggish, especially during fast swipes when frames appear insufficient.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience lag and frame deficiency when switching between home and apps screens, particularly during fast swipes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent performance degradation during screen transitions, affecting user experience but not causing device unavailability or crash.

rows.Title: Severe lag after setting up the Quick Settings panel
rows.Problem: Severe lag occurs after customizing the quick settings panel, with RAM usage dropping from 12GB to 2GB and not recovering even after restarting the device and reconfiguring settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Severe lag occurs after customizing the quick settings panel, with RAM usage dropping to 2GB and not recovering despite restart and reconfiguration.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes significantly unresponsive with unstable RAM usage, indicating a major performance issue that affects core functionality.

rows.Title: Issue where both morning and afternoon routines run simultaneously during morning hours
rows.Problem: Morning and afternoon routines run simultaneously during morning hours
rows.Summarized Problem: Both morning and afternoon routines execute at the same time during morning hours.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the routine scheduling feature, leading to unintended execution of multiple routines at once.

rows.Title: Text overlap at the bottom when setting a routine icon
rows.Problem: Text overlap at the bottom when setting a routine icon
rows.Summarized Problem: Text overlaps at the bottom when setting a routine icon in Samsung Members app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial UI malfunction during routine icon setup, affecting user experience but not rendering the app unusable.

rows.Title: Pop-up appears for "Routine triggered when leaving home" even when inside the house
rows.Problem: A routine labeled 'triggered when leaving home' runs even when the user is inside the house, suggesting a location recognition error.
rows.Summarized Problem: A home routine incorrectly triggers when the user is inside the house, indicating a location recognition error.
rows.Severity Reason: The routine execution error prevents users from relying on location-based automation, making the feature unusable in intended scenarios.

rows.Title: Settings do not revert to default after ending a routine
rows.Problem: After ending a routine, settings do not revert to default. For example, when connecting to Android Auto, 4G priority mode is set, and after the routine ends, the setting remains on 4G mode instead of reverting to original settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Settings do not revert to default after ending a routine, causing persistent 4G priority mode even after routine completion.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where settings fail to reset, but the device remains functional and users can still use other features.

rows.Title: Scroll capture does not work intermittently after the update
rows.Problem: Scroll capture does not work properly after the 8.5 beta update, functioning intermittently and failing during multiple attempts
rows.Summarized Problem: Scroll capture functionality fails intermittently after the 8.5 beta update, failing during multiple attempts and not working consistently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent malfunction of a core camera feature, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.

rows.Title: Clock size cannot be changed in the lock screen editing menu
rows.Problem: Clock size cannot be changed in the lock screen editing menu
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the clock size in the lock screen editing menu.

rows.Problem: The 'Enable Multi-Window Support for All Apps' feature in Labs turns off automatically, even when enabled, and there is no clear indication or log when it occurs. rows.Severity Reason: The feature unexpectedly disables after developer options are used, making it unusable for users who rely on it, and there is no visible trigger or log to identify when it occurs.

rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience complete app crashes when attempting to copy text in webview-based apps.

rows.Title: Swipe sensitivity is uncomfortable when switching apps
rows.Problem: Swipe sensitivity for app switching using navigation bar is significantly different after the 8.5 beta update. Previously, app switching worked smoothly with approximate swipes near the navigation bar, but now it requires very precise and fast swipes to work, and it often fails even then.
rows.Summarized Problem: App switching via navigation bar is now overly sensitive and unreliable after the 8.5 beta update, requiring precise and fast swipes that often fail.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent app switching but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to appear consistently, leading to user frustration and potential loss of key information on the lock screen, which is a primary user interface element.

rows.Title: Font Size and Style
rows.Problem: The selected font is not applied in most apps, showing default fonts instead of user-selected ones, even after updating apps like Chrome to version 143.0.7499.52.

rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects multiple apps but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes; font display is partially malfunctioning.

rows.Title: The weather icon color on the AOD lock screen reflects the lock screen clock color
rows.Problem: When the weather information display is turned on in the lock screen, the weather icon appears on the clock part. In the AOD (Always On Display) state, the temperature icon turns white as expected, but the weather icon follows the lock screen clock color instead. Therefore, when the clock font transparency is enabled or the clock is set to black, the weather icon does not appear on the AOD screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The weather icon on the AOD lock screen displays with the same color as the lock screen clock instead of using a consistent white background, making it invisible when the clock is set to black or transparent.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of the weather icon under specific settings but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and the functionality remains partially usable.

rows.Title: Continual Bluetooth disconnections to DeWalt tstak radio streaming YouTube
rows.Problem: Since installing beta, I'm getting continual Bluetooth disconnections to DeWalt tstak radio streaming YouTube. Phone will disconnect from the device approx every 15mins. Additionally when streaming YouTube music to sph-da360 the stream frequently just stops and have to press play again. This has only happened since installing beta. No updates on play store for YouTube music Yet.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences frequent Bluetooth disconnections when streaming YouTube to a DeWalt radio or YouTube music to a sph-da36-than device, with the connection dropping every 15 minutes and requiring manual restart of the stream.
rows.Severity Reason: The Bluetooth disconnections occur frequently and disrupt ongoing media streaming, making the device unusable for real-time audio streaming tasks.

rows.Summarized Problem: The button to sync with OneDrive in the Gallery app does not work.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a functional element in the app interface that does not operate as intended, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Private album quickly flashes before crashing
rows.Problem: Private album quickly flashes before crashing
rows.Summarized Problem: Private album quickly flashes and crashes after displaying.
rows.Severity Reason: The private album crashes immediately after loading, causing the user to lose access to content and disrupting core functionality.

rows.Title: Gallery app settings back button dissappears for a second
rows.Problem: The back button in the Gallery app settings disappears for a second.
rows.Summarized Problem: The back button in the Gallery app settings briefly disappears.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief interruption in navigation but does not prevent full device operation or lead to data loss.
